name: Part 2: Save Successfully Generated Videos from HeyGen to Google Sheets
description:
Use this template to monitor for successfully generated videos in HeyGen. This is a part 2 of the video generating use case triggered by this [template.](https://eu1.make.com/templates/14713?organizationId=837&templatePublicId=14713) We highly recommend you specify the same spreadsheet ID as in the triggerring template. Your spreadsheet is expected to have these columns:
  • Video Title
  • Script
  • HeyGen Video ID
  • Video Link
